description: This file defines a Fragment class named CategoryNotesFragment used in an Android application. The fragment is responsible for displaying notes filtered by a specific category using a RecyclerView with a GridLayoutManager. It interacts with a ViewModel to fetch data, sets up an adapter for list display, and handles note item clicks to initiate editing activities.

classes.name: CategoryNotesFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays a list of notes filtered by category using a RecyclerView. It utilizes ViewModel for data retrieval and provides navigation to note editing.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Static factory method to create a new instance of CategoryNotesFragment with a specified category argument.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, initializes RecyclerView and its adapter, retrieves the category argument, sets up ViewModel to observe notes data, and defines click behavior for notes.
